input.sentences: the annual halloween party was held at the community center .
the elders decided to decorate with a scary theme in mind .
the kids were able to get their faces painted
and enjoyed themselves even when waiting in line .
the day ended with a bond fire .
output.sentences: The halloween party would be held at Burien Community Center.
People didn't mind the scary theme.
The kids got their face painted.
Kids were waiting in line and enjoyed the activities.
At the end of the day, there was a bond fire.
